Posted By: Dragek (7/10/2009 3:45:23 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: This is Time Walk for 3 more mana. This card just shows how heavily overpowered Blue is. Black is my favorite color, and it is the most underpowered color this go around. Red has Lightning Bolt & cards like Swerve or Shunt (counters w/twist), White has Path to Exile, Baneslayer, etc, Green has elves/faeries which has always been a tournament staple, as well as its intense synergy with White now, and Blue... is something every player has to play now. Doom Blade isn't that good as you can regen the creature, Lilliana Vess is not the best planeswalker by far... I could go on. For 5 mana, black gets Rise From The Grave. Wtf?
posts.html:
This is Time Walk for 3 more mana. This card just shows how heavily overpowered Blue is. Black is my favorite color, and it is the most underpowered color this go around. Red has Lightning Bolt & cards like Swerve or Shunt (counters w/twist), White has Path to Exile, Baneslayer, etc, Green has elves/faeries which has always been a tournament staple, as well as its intense synergy with White now, and Blue... is something every player has to play now. Doom Blade isn't that good as you can regen the creature, Lilliana Vess is not the best planeswalker by far... I could go on. For 5 mana, black gets Rise From The Grave. Wtf?

posts.post_content: The fact that it's targeted makes it vulnerable to things like [Shunt](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Shunt), [Swerve](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Swerve), and [Wild Ricochet](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wild Ricochet). posts.post_content: i have to agree that black is seriously getting worse...i mean, dreg reaver and zombie goliath? i think they're running out of ideas for black. black is also getting really sucky mythics...kalitas is just impratical with it's mana cost, and ob nixilis has only three toughnesss...a bolt can kill it already. vampire nocturnus is good, i agree, but it only works in vampire decks, while the cards the other colors are getting are so darn flexible...baneslayer is a staple in any tournament deck that plays white, time warp is useful in almost every situation, green has overrun, which is a game ender most of the time. red is just awesome now, but i think it is getting a lot harder to build a mono black deck now...
